change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 51/2016, effective March 2, 2016.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Exclusion of Railway Bridges and Tunnels from the Definition of Improvements Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Exclusions effective for the 2000 and subsequent taxation years
bcl:section.bcl:text: Bridges that carry track in place of a railway corporation are excluded from the definition of "improvements" in section 1 of the Assessment Act for 2000 and subsequent taxation years except in the following jurisdictions listed in Schedule 2.
Tunnels that carry track in place of a railway corporation are excluded from the definition of improvements in section 1 of the Assessment Act.

Despite sections 1 and 2, in relation to taxes under the School Act, bridges that carry track in place of a railway corporation are excluded from the definition of "improvements" in section 1 of the Assessment Act in 1997 and subsequent taxation years.

bcl:schedule.bcl:indent1: The Corporation of the City of Revelstoke
The Corporation of the District of Pitt Meadows
The Corporation of the Village of Lytton

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Assessment Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 20, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 22 (1) (a)]
